items.title: See value investor David Einhorn's latest portfolio
items.description: David Einhorn's Greenlight Capital has upped its bets on two key stocks during the fourth quarter.

items.title: Druckenmiller buys airline shares, Amazon and Warner Brothers, while dumping Broadcom
items.description: Druckenmiller added several new positions during the fourth quarter of 2024.

items.title: Third Point's Dan Loeb ups stake in gambling stock and is accumulating Meta again
items.description: The return to buying Meta followed a decision to sell the social media company's shares in the prior quarter.

items.title: ‘Big Short’ investor Michael Burry shakes up his China bets, adding Temu-parent PDD
items.description: The famed investor added a $7.3 million bet on PDD in the fourth quarter, while reducing his exposure in JD.com and Alibaba.

items.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway adds Constellation Brands shares, sells more Bank of America
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway continued selling its big Bank of America stake in the fourth quarter, while the conglomerate added a new stake in Constellation Br...
